short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that allow you to use Kaguya

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kaguya Extension is a powerful tool designed to enhance the user experience on our website (Kaguya) by providing a seamless and convenient way to access free streaming content from various websites. This extension allows our website to scrape other websites for free streaming links, enabling them to find and watch their favourite anime shows or read their favourite manga without any hassle.
